alert.note: Alert for Edwards (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 6:04PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Edwards and northeastern Val Verde Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 603 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles north of Loma Alta, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Devils River State Nat Area Del Norte. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
